import React from 'react'; import '../styles/components/Scorecard.css'; const Scorecard = ({ battingScorecard, bowlingScorecard }) => { if (!battingScorecard || !bowlingScorecard) { return

No scorecard data available.

; } return (
{/* ✅ Batting Scorecard */}

🏏 Batting Scorecard

🏠 Home Team

{battingScorecard.home_team.map((player) => ( ))}
Player Runs Balls Fours Sixes Strike Rate Dismissal
{player.name} {player.runs} {player.balls_faced} {player.fours} {player.sixes} {player.strike_rate} {player.dismissal || '-'}

🏆 Away Team

{battingScorecard.away_team.map((player) => ( ))}
Player Runs Balls Fours Sixes Strike Rate Dismissal
{player.name} {player.runs} {player.balls_faced} {player.fours} {player.sixes} {player.strike_rate} {player.dismissal || '-'}
{/* ✅ Bowling Scorecard */}

🎯 Bowling Scorecard

🏠 Home Team

{bowlingScorecard.home_team.map((player) => ( ))}
Player Overs Runs Wickets Economy Maidens Wides No Balls
{player.name} {player.overs} {player.runs_conceded} {player.wickets} {player.economy} {player.maidens} {player.wides} {player.no_balls}

🏆 Away Team

{bowlingScorecard.away_team.map((player) => ( ))}
Player Overs Runs Wickets Economy Maidens Wides No Balls
{player.name} {player.overs} {player.runs_conceded} {player.wickets} {player.economy} {player.maidens} {player.wides} {player.no_balls}
); }; export default Scorecard;
